meteringrange: EV 0 - 20 (at 23°C / 73°F with EF50mm f/1.4 USM lens, ISO 100)
noisereduction: Applicable to long exposures and high ISO speed shots
shutterspeeds: 1/4000sec. to 1/60sec. (Scene Intelligent Auto mode), X-sync at 1/200secs 1/4000sec. to 30secs., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode.)
movieplayback: Enabled (LCD monitor, video / audio OUT, HDMI OUT), Built-in speaker
imagedisplayformats: Single image, Single image + Info (Basic info, shooting info, histogram), 4-image index, 9-image index, image rotate possible
imagetype: JPEG, RAW (14-bit Canon original) RAW+JPEG Large simultaneous recording possible
withliveviewshooting: Approx. 180 shots at 23°C / 73°F Approx. 150 shots at 0°C / 32°F
battery: Battery Pack LP-E8 (Qty.1) * AC power can be supplied via AC Adapter Kit ACK-E8. * With Battery Grip BG-E8 attached, size-AA / LR6 batteries can be used.
picturestyle: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Def. 1 - 3
compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses (including EF-S lenses) (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx. 1.6 times the lens focal length)
hdmiminioutterminal: Type C (Auto switching of resolution), CEC-compatible
audiovideooutdigitalterminal: Analog video (Compatible with NTSC / PAL) / stereo audio output For personal computer communication and direct printing (Hi-Speed USB equivalent)
exposurecontrol: Program AE for movies and manual exposure
creativezonemodes: ISO 100 - 6400 set manually (whole-stop  increments), ISO 100 - 6400 set automatically, maximum ISO speed  settable for ISO Auto, or ISO expansion to "H" (equivalent to ISO 12800)
afassistbeam: Small series of flashes fired by built-in flash
isospeedrecommendedexposureindex: With auto exposure shooting:Automatically set within ISO 100 - 6400
aeb: ±2 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments (Can be combined with manual exposure compensation)
aelock: Auto:Applied in One-Shot AF mode with evaluative metering when focus is achieved
moviecompression: MPEG-4 AVC / H.264 Variable (average) bit rate
soundrecording: Built-in monaural microphone External stereo microphone terminal provided Sound recording level adjustable, wind filter provided
focusmodes: One-Shot AF, AI Servo AF, AI Focus AF, Manual focusing (MF)
backgroundmusic: Selectable for slide shows and movie playback
externalflash: EX-series Speedlite (Flash functions settable with the camera)
imagebrowsingmethods: Single image, jump by 10 or 100 images, by shooting date, by folder, by movies, by stills, by rating
recordingmedia: SD memory card, SDHC memory card, SDXC memory card
movieshootingtime: Approx. 1hr. 40mins. at 23°C / 73°F Approx. 1hr. 20mins. at 0°C / 32°F (With a fully-charged Battery Pack LP-E8)
basic: Shoot by ambience selection, Shoot by lighting or scene type
drivemode: Single shooting, continuous shooting, self-timer with 10-secs. or 2-secs. delay and 10-secs. delay with continuous shooting
focusing: Same as focusing with Live View shooting
dustdeletefeature: Auto, Manual, Dust Delete Data appending
meteringmodes: Center-weighted average and evaluative metering with the image sensor * Automatically set by the focusing mode.
creativefilters: Grainy B/W, Soft focus, Fish-eye Effect, Toy Camera Effect, Miniature Effect
batterylifebasedoncipatestingstandards: With viewfinder shooting:Approx. 440 shots at 23°C / 73°F Approx. 400 shots at 0°C / 32°F
slideshow: All images, by date, by folder, movies, stills or by rating Five transition effects selectable
coverage: Vertical / Horizontal approx. 95% (with Eye point approx. 19mm)
whitebalance: Auto, Preset (Daylight, Shade, Cloudy,  Tungsten light, White fluorescent light, Flash), Custom White balance  correction and white balance bracketing features provided * Flash colour temperature information communication provided.
